overview: Juliette takes Matteo, who has just had a car accident, back home. There she meets his mother and discovers she is terminally ill. Matteo can't stand seeing her suffer any more and decides to help her to die. Juliette is attracted to Matteo but she is pregnant with her professor's child. She wants to keep the baby. He does not...  Written by Guy Bellinger (IMDB)
title: Giovani
